Package databaseConnection

Class SignupAndLoginExceptions

java.lang.Object
databaseConnection.SignupAndLoginExceptions
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConsumerDBConn, DatabaseUpdate
public class SignupAndLoginExceptions extends Object
This class contains custom exceptions for signup and login operations.
